website_summaries.verdict: These binoculars are labeled for adults or kids, but they are made to meet professional standards.
pros: The 50-millimeter objective lens provides a large viewing field
The FMC multi-coated lenses increase light transmission for a clear image every time
cons: These binoculars are a bit heavier than advertised, but they get the job done

customer_reviews.title: Good / Not so good
customer_reviews.text: The Good = The image is as advertised. ( good ). Colimation is spot on, probably due to the excellent packaging, they had a stiff 3/4 in air cell cushion on all six sides in the factory box. The not so good. This is a second quality item. They have a large blemish on the painted parts. The IPD hinge is vary stiff. They do not have a tripod port, Although the little cover were the tripod port would be is labeled with a tripod symbol. I guess that's why they were priced so low. Never the less I will keep them for there quality image.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Steele

customer_reviews.title: Good Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. It is tough as nails and give an excellent picture quality. 12x50 should be able to handle all we need in general. They have the perfect magnification and field of view for a general pair of binoculars that could be used for everything from hunting to bird watching.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty nice for the price. A little on the heavy side. But feel great in the hand. They are very clear as well even zooming in on target.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for a trip to Alaska and they worked wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Emily Shook

customer_reviews.title: Works Good For Price
customer_reviews.text: Work as advertised however feel is very plastic and delicate. Certain parts could have been made a little stronger with minimal price increase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are of regular old style size but still well built.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for distances of 150- 300 yards. I se them for bird watching and landscapes. These are descent quality and feel well built.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Very good binoculars
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good just as described they're not cheaply made neither
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Hall

customer_reviews.title: very clear and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am legally blind believe it or not I use these binoculars to watch television
customer_reviews.author: Greg Gilreath

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I paid such a small amount of money for great binoculars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip to Alaska and they didn’t disappoint! Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy VH

product_meta.title: 12 x 50 Binoculars for Adults Kids Professional HD Binoculars Compact Lightweight for Birds Watching Hunting Concerts Outdoor Sports Games Travel with Clear Vision & Strap Carrying Bag
product_meta.description:
The MARNUR Lightweight Binoculars, which boasts of 12x magnification and 50mm objective lenses, help you capture high-definition images with true-to-life details and accurate color reproduction, a great companion for wildlife viewing, bird watching, sports events, travel, stage play, and more. The center focus adjustment wheel and right diopter ring work together for optima hunting optics. A convenient binoculars strap is included to make the binoculars easy to carry. 

Features
1. BAK4 prism - Provides better optical quality and a higher refractive index 
2. PVC shell - Durable, daily waterproof, and easy to keep hold of. 
3. Fully multi-coated - Enhances light transmission, clarity, and contrast. 
4. Center focus adjustment wheel - Used to adjust the focus on both barrels simultaneously. 
5. Right diopter ring - Used to compensate for any differences that you may have between your left and right eyes. 
6. Included binoculars strap - Makes the binoculars easy to carry. 
How to Use
1. Remove eyepiece covers. 
2. Adjust interpupillary distance (the distance between eyepieces). 
3. Adjust center focus adjustment wheel. 
4. Adjust right diopter ring. 
Tips 
1. Do not observe strong light sources like the sun directly using the product. 
2. Please try not to touch the lenses directly with fingers. 
3. Please clean dirt on the lenses with mildly damp cleaning cloth. 
4. If the product malfunctions, please do not disassemble the product by yourself.
feature_bullets: 【FMC Multi-coated】The hunting binoculars are equipped with fully FMC multi-coated lenses to increase light transmission, improve clarity and contrast, and minimize lens reflections for HD images with true-to-life details and edge-to-edge sharpness, no color distortion and no glare, while effectively resisting scratch to protect lenses

【Premium Parameters for Multiple Use】This lightweight binoculars feature 12x magnification and 50mm objective lenses to ensure clear large field of view even from long distance up to 1000 meters, ideal for travel, climbing, driving scenery, bird watching, stage play, concert theater, football game, and more

【BAK4 Prisms】Professionally designed with BAK4 prisms, high-density with better optical quality and a higher refractive index than BK7, to ensure images captured remain correct orientation and colors after being magnified, as well as giving better defined images

【Easy to Focus】To observe a new target, use center focus adjustment wheel to adjust the focus on both barrels simultaneously; Then right diopter ring can be used to adjust the focus on right barrel independently to compensate for difference that you may have between your left and right eyes; Both work together for optima hunting optics

【Durable & Daily Waterproof】The shell, made of PVC, offers non-slip and comfortable grip, as well as durable external protection; Together with daily waterproof design, the compact binoculars will carry out maximum performance in various weather conditions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars21 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
